name: Paint Me Something, Will You?
description:
======================================== CONTROLS ========================================

Left-click and drag a die on the left onto the board to "paint".

Right-click and drag a die on the left onto the board to "erase" using its shape.

Scroll on a die on the left to rotate it.

Hover on a placed die to see its shape.

========================================== RULES ==========================================

The game plays quite similar to Sudoku. The score is determined by the nearby dice that form the shape of the middle die. If all spaces of the shape of the middle die are filled with different color dice, you receive points  equal to the value of the middle die. If there are two or more identical dice, you lose points equal to the value of the middle die. There are about 30 dice, and the game ends when you run out of dice. An example:

All 4 dice that make up the middle 4's shape are DIFFERENT. You'll get 4 points.

There are 2 dice that are IDENTICAL (they're both 8s) within the 4's shape. You'll get -4 points.

Deleting one of those 8s will stop the penalty.

Thank you for playing my game. Bugs are expected. Share your high score if you want and I will use the highest score as a screenshot!

(VERY SORRY ABOUT THE JARRING COMPUTER-GENERATED MUSIC. MUTE IF YOU WANT!)

==================================== CURRENT HIGH SCORE ====================================
